articles.description: Everton players and Frank Lampard will require no reminding improvement is needed during the second half of the season
articles.content:
Everton midfielder Alex Iwobi has called for supporters to 'stick by' Frank Lampard amid the club's bitterly disappointing start to the current season.

articles.description: Exclusive: The cost of buying the 'P shares' will be used to pay off Government loans made to both clubs during the Covid-19 pandemic
articles.content:
Wasps and Worcesters Premiership rivals are to seize the clubs P shares following confirmation of their relegation to the Championship next season.

articles.title: Bristol Rovers fans plan touching tribute to daughter of icon Darrell Clarke at Port Vale clash - Bristol Live
articles.description: Darrell Clarke always gets a brilliant reception when he faces Bristol Rovers, but Saturday's League One fixture against Port Vale is set to feature an emotional tribute following the death of his daughter
articles.content:
Bristol Rovers fans plan to show their support for former manager Darrell Clarke when his Port Vale side visit the Mem on Saturday.
